document.full_text: a man apparently angry over a divorce case went on a shooting spree in and around yuma, arizona, on thursday, killing five people and wounding another before taking his own life, authorities said.
document.title: shooting in yuma, arizona, leaves 6 dead
lines_and_colors: a man apparently angry over a divorce case went on a shooting spree in and around yuma, arizona, on thursday, killing five people and wounding another before taking his own life, authorities said.
